description.raw:
This is broken off of pull request #57.

* Randomize table position inside habitat in a way that it's always around the center
* Randomize tools positions on top of the table
* Add stacks of crates around the habitat so that they:
    * don't collide with the table
    * stay a bit away from the walls
    * might be immediately in front of doors, but there's still room to move around them
    * there's always one stack near the wall with the leak

![t3_random.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/xEbAAe/images/497788305-t3_random.png)

Keep in mind that these scripts are mainly there for convenience, they might not generate perfect worlds 100% of the time. I'm also open to suggestions on how to make the habitat more exciting.
